definition.text: We are now in the Close Stage. I thought it would be interesting to tell you more about execution algorithms, with another example.

paragraphs.text: An Execution Algorithm may handle multiple orders, of all types. In this case, multiple limit sell orders are defined.
Select Configure on the menu of the algorithm and reflect on the implications of this definition!

Both the open stage, where you define how to take a position, and the close stage, where you define how to exit, may feature multiple execution algorithms, each of them handling a certain amount of capital.
